it.poliba.sisinflab.dlpreferences.sat

Class BooleanFormula

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.poliba.sisinflab.dlpreferences.sat.BooleanFormula

  • public class BooleanFormula
extends java.lang.Object
    A boolean formula in conjunctive normal form.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addClause(DimacsLiterals clause)
      Adds the specified clause.
      void addLiteral(int literal)
      Adds a trivial clause consisting of the specified literal.
      void addNegatedClause(DimacsLiterals clause)
      Adds the negation of the specified clause, that is, the conjunction of its negated literals (De Morgan's law).
      java.util.stream.Stream<DimacsLiterals> clauses()
      Returns the clauses that make up this formula.
      static BooleanFormula empty()
      Returns a new empty formula.
      static BooleanFormula emptySynchronized()
      Returns a new empty formula, backed by a synchronized set.
      boolean equals(java.lang.Object o) 
      int hashCode() 
      int size()
      Returns the number of clauses in this formula.
      static java.util.stream.Collector<DimacsLiterals,?,BooleanFormula> toFormula()
      Returns a Collector that accumulates input clauses into a new formula.
      java.lang.String toString() 
      static java.util.stream.Collector<DimacsLiterals,?,BooleanFormula> toSynchronizedFormula()
      Returns a Collector that accumulates input clauses into a new formula, backed by a synchronized set.
